directions: Spray large frying pan or electric skillet with vegetable spray. Brown chicken breasts in pan, meat side down.
Turn chicken over; add pineapple chunks, onion soup, and water.
Cover, and reduce heat to low.  Simmer for 30 minutes. Garnish with cooked pineapple chunks and fresh orange slices.
ingredients: 1 1/2 (1 ounce) packages dry onion soup mix
title: Pineapple Chicken
